articles.author: Ordinary Wealth
articles.title: Warren Buffett Says America's 'Incredible Period' Is Ending - Seeking Alpha
articles.description: Warren Buffett purported that the end of the last prosperous period for the U.S. economy is happening now. Click here to read what investors need to know.
articles.content:
Zerbor
At Berkshire Hathaway's annual general meeting on Saturday, Mr. Buffett had ominous words to share. He said that during the past 6 months, the "incredible period" for the U.S. economy has bee… [+3991 chars]
